attributes.action: ... Explain the situation in Israel & why it was necessary for the establishment of the State of Israel in 1948
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The situation in Israel is particularly complexed.  The indigenuous people have a right to their land to which they have been for hundreds of years been prosecuted & FORCED from their land for many hundreds of years - this will continue as long as lies are made by dishonest infractionious groups.  Israelis have also tried to find peace but have been forced to protect what is rightfully theirs by infractions of secular & nationalist groups of so-called Palestine.  Wasn't Palestine previously known as Israel.

rejection.details:
The Foreign and Commonwealth Office has a whole section devoted to the Middle East Peace Process on its website:

http://www.fco.gov.uk/servlet/Front?pagename=OpenMarket/Xcelerate/ShowPage&c=Page&cid=1007029394644
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
